comments.body: I think you need to fix the generator, not modify its output.

i'm not familiar with the generator - have any pointers?

On Thu, Jan 7, 2016 at 10:11 AM, Daniel Smith notifications@github.com
wrote:

> >     if err != nil {
> >         return err
> >     }
> > -   config.Prefix = "/apis"
> > -   config.APIPath = "/apis"
> 
> I think you need to fix the generator, not modify its output.
